main.tznet wiki start page

Welcome to your new wiki. A wiki is a special kind of website that allows everyone to edit it's content and collaborate in creating that content. Every wiki page can be organized and searched providing easy access to the information you create.

This is the index page where you should put links to the more important topics so they can be gotten to quickly.

currently the only pages that exist are:

  • Tutorial this is an introduction to how to use this wiki software.
  • Solar Outpost documentation this is a collection of documents about the system you are currently using as shipped by Genesi
